hero.title: Learn Brazilian Portuguese for Business and Culture
hero.subtitle: Whether you're expanding your business or connecting with Brazilian art and traditions, our flexible, personalized classes with native instructors are designed to fit your life and goals.

problem.title: Here's What's Holding You Back
problem.subtitle: Struggling to Learn Brazilian Portuguese? You're Not Alone.

cards.title: Life's Too Busy for Rigid Class Times
cards.text: Trying to fit language classes into your packed schedule feels impossible. Most courses offer fixed timings that clash with work, family, or other commitments, leaving you frustrated and unable to progress.

cards.title: Generic Courses Don't Meet Your Needs
cards.text: Most Portuguese courses focus on European Portuguese or offer generic content that doesn't align with your goals. Whether it's for business, travel, or cultural connection, you need a program tailored to your unique needs.

cards.title: Learning Without Context Feels Empty
cards.text: Language is more than just words—it's culture, expressions, and real-life context. Without authentic Brazilian cultural immersion, your learning feels disconnected and incomplete.

features.title: Why Choose Us?
features.subtitle: Flexible, Personalized, and Culturally Immersive Classes Designed Just for You
features.description: At Sotaque Brasileiro, we've reimagined language learning to fit your life. With flexible scheduling, personalized lessons, and authentic cultural immersion, you'll finally achieve your Portuguese goals—on your terms.

cards.title: Learn Anytime, Anywhere
cards.text: Say goodbye to rigid class times. Our platform offers classes that fit your schedule, whether it's early mornings, late nights, or weekends. You're in control of your learning journey.

cards.title: Lessons Designed for Your Goals
cards.text: Whether you're learning for business, travel, or cultural connection, our personalized lessons are crafted to meet your unique needs. No more one-size-fits-all courses!

cards.title: Culturally Immersive Lessons
cards.text: Language is more than words—it's culture. Our classes include authentic Brazilian expressions, music, and traditions, so you can connect deeply with the language and its people.

cards.title: Native Instructors
cards.text: Our instructors are native Brazilian Portuguese speakers with years of experience teaching students from around the world. They bring real-life context and cultural insights to every lesson.
